Name: Ys IX -Monstrum NOX-
About the game: ■Story The story takes place in sprawling Balduq, also known as Prison City, located in the Gllia-Erdlingen region, northeast of Esterior. Here, a new adventure exploring the mysteries of the prison, alongside monsters (also known as monstrum) with various unique abilities, is about to unfold… ■About the Game In addition to the hallmarks of the Ys series, such as an array of skill attacks, fast-paced action and thrilling boss battles, the game also introduces a number of new elements that are closely linked to Ys IX, such as the ability to explore the field in all directions via monstrum special abilities! ■All Bonus Content Included! In addition, the Steam® version of the game includes bonus items, such as exclusive costumes and attachments, that were originally released on other consoles. The Monstrum Show costumes, in addition to the Hagu Hagu series, which can be worn on a character's arms, the Secret Potion Set, which raises a character's level, the ever-useful Accessory Set is also included, making gameplay easy for beginners and newcomers to Ys 9 alike. Explore the Prison City in your own unique style!
